SCRCdataAPI 1.17.2
  • Reference

Get existing entries

Source: R/get_existing.R
get_existing.Rd

Get entries (from the data registry) in a particular table

get_existing(table, limit_results = TRUE, detail = "all")

Arguments

table

a string specifying the name of the table
limit_results

a boolean specifying whether or not to limit the results, default is TRUE
detail

a string specifying what level of detail to return; options are "all" for all details or "id" for just URL and IDs

Value

Returns a data.frame of entries in table, default is limited to 100 entries

See also

Other get functions: get_components(), get_entry(), get_file_hash(), get_github_hash(), get_package_info()

Examples

# Get all entries in storage_root
get_existing("storage_root", limit_results = FALSE)

#> # A tibble: 78 x 7
#>    url     last_updated  name     root    accessibility updated_by  locations   
#>    <chr>   <chr>         <chr>    <chr>   <chr>         <chr>       <chr>       
#>  1 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source-… source… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  2 https:… 2020-10-30T1… https:/… https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  3 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source … https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  4 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source-… source… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  5 https:… 2020-10-30T1… https:/… https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  6 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source … https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  7 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source-… source… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  8 https:… 2020-10-30T1… https:/… https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#>  9 https:… 2020-10-30T1… source-… source… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#> 10 https:… 2020-10-30T1… https:/… https:… 0             https://da… https://dat…
#> # … with 68 more rows

# Get 100 newest entries in data_product
get_existing("data_product")

#> # A tibble: 100 x 7
#>    url       last_updated   name      version updated_by   object    namespace
